summary: THE VEHICLE STALLED AROUND 6 PM ONE EVENING, WHEN TRYING TO ACCELERATE. WAS ABLE TO GET IT BACK IN DRIVEWAY. 6 HOURS LATER TRIED TO DRIVE IT AGAIN, AND IT STALLED, ON ACCELERATION. WAS ABLE TO GET IT OUT OF THE INTERSECTION AND COULD NOT START THE CAR AGAIN. HAD IT TOWED TO THE MECHANICS AND THEY SPENT THE DAY TRYING TO RECREATE THE PROBLEM AND COULD NOT.
